definition: beam/rafter/lintel/person able to bear heavy responsibility/mainstay (of organization)/pillar (of state)
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Thee carpenter singing his as he measures his plank or beam.
sentences.chinese: 木匠在歌唱着，一邊比量着他的木板或梁木。

sentences.english: He is a person of rare talent. You must put him in a very important position.
sentences.chinese: 他是不可多得的梁木，你一定要好好重用他。

sentences.english: They braced up the old house with balks of timber.
sentences.chinese: 他們用梁木加固舊房子。

sentences.english: It is difficult to pass by these houses without stopping to wonder at the enormous beams.
sentences.chinese: 你走過這些屋子，不能不欣賞那些粗大的梁木。

sentences.english: He is canting the edge of a beam.
sentences.chinese: 他正在把梁木的邊截成斜角。

sentences.english: The balk design silently displaying the history of the house.
sentences.chinese: 屋頂的梁木設計，無言地展示歷史。

definition: a building/the frame of a building/roof beam/truss
thin bamboo strips used for basket weaving
